faq.title: ‚ùì Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about XChange

free.question: Is XChange free?
free.answer: Yes! Registration and posting listings is completely free. We only charge a small commission when a deal is successfully completed (1-3% depending on category).

escrow.question: How does the Escrow system work?
escrow.answer: When the buyer pays, the money is held in a secure account. It's only transferred to the seller after the buyer confirms receipt and that the product matches the description. This protects both parties.

authentic.question: How do I ensure the product is authentic?
authentic.answer: We provide specialized inspections per category: IMEI check for mobiles, XRF testing for gold, 150-point inspection for cars, and Entrupy verification for luxury brands.

smartBarter.question: What is Smart Barter?
smartBarter.answer: An AI system that finds perfect barter deals for you. It supports direct barter (A‚ÜîB) and multi-party chains (A‚ÜíB‚ÜíC‚ÜíA) with the option to add cash difference.

sellTime.question: How long does it take to sell a product?
sellTime.answer: It depends on the product, but average selling time is 2-5 days. You can speed this up using paid promotion or competitive pricing.

installments.question: Can I buy on installments?
installments.answer: Yes! We offer installment options in partnership with approved banks and financing companies. Available for cars, real estate, and mobiles.

fraud.question: How do I protect myself from fraud?
fraud.answer: Always use the escrow system for payment, verify seller authentication, request to inspect the product, and never pay outside the platform. Our team is available 24/7 for any inquiries.

mobileApp.question: Is there a mobile app?
mobileApp.answer: We're working on launching iOS and Android apps soon. Currently the website is fully responsive and works smoothly on mobile.
